message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, but a 60/40 split isn't fair to me. Let's be reasonable and meet in the middle.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my revised offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The value of the money is decreasing with every round.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
